duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide on-site and remote IT support for 16 OptumRx pharmacy fulfillment locations.
Serve as a key on-site liaison between applications and vendors for the detection and resolution of software defects and future enhancements/user stories.
Participate in an on-call rotation supporting production hours outside of on-site IT support hours.
Manage and troubleshoot Windows PC hardware, peripherals, and software (50-150 workstations based on site model).
Manage and troubleshoot Windows Servers running the Pharmacy Control System Software (~ 8 app servers, 3-mode SQL database cluster).
Direct on-site, hands-on support of user applications and system configuration issues.
Provide training and mentorship to new and developing team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field (Master's preferred)
